# cook your code here
s=raw_input()
n,k = [int(i) for i in s.split(' ')]
s=raw_input()
a = [int(i) for i in s.split(' ')]
a=sorted(a)
i=-1
count=0
if count==0:
    i=0
    while(i<n and a[i]<=k):
        i=i+1
        count=count+1
    i=i-1
    #count = count+1
else:
    while(i<n and a[i]<=k):
        i=i+1
        count=count+1
#print a
#print i
t=0
if i!=0 and (a[n-2]+a[n-1]>=k):
    for j in range(i):
        for p in range(j+1,i+1):
            if a[j]+a[p]==k:
                t=1
                #print a[j]
                #print a[p]
                break
        if t==1:
            break
else:
    t=0
    
#print a[j]
#print a[p]
if t==1:
    print "Yes"
else:
    print "No"
